property.name: Flavor
property.value: As insubstantial, and as powerful, as the wind that carries it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Students who had seen Rayne argue with Urza were certain she had summoned it to make him seem warmer by comparison.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments victory was mine." - Gustha Ebbasdotter Kjeldoran royal mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As elusive as the footprint of a djinn - Suq'Ata expression

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know you've angered the gods when the clouds turn against you." - Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen fog so thick you could cut it, but none that could cut me." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Giant Crab gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the giant crabs' mating season, Skyshroud nights are filled with the clatter of their skirmishes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Controlling time ensures you need never look impulsive again." - Teferi

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Killer Whale gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunger is like the sea: deep, endless, and unforgiving.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Leviathan enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan. Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drakes claim to be dragons - until the dragons show up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Afterward, Tolaria's winds were like the whispers of lost wizards, calling for life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Awake and awing in the blink of an eye.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only fools believe they will face my armies but once." - Kaervek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail." - Volrath

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home, As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse - the curse had been fulfilled.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greven il-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only black mana on X. Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Fallen Angel gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Angels are simply extensions of truth upon the fabric of life - and there is far more dark than light."Baron Sengir

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The nightstalkers are such a minor power in Urborg. Their sad eagerness to elevate themselves makes them willing tools in the plundering of little Femeref." - Kaervek

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A full coffin is like a full coffer - both are attractive to thieves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This monstrosity will do - for now." - Davvol, Evincar of Rath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The imps' warbling cries echo through Phyrexia's towers like those of mourning doves in a cathedral.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tar Pit Warrior becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cyclops shrugged off savage blows, but casual insults made him weep." - Azeworai, "The Cyclops who Couldn't"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's big an' dumb an' ready to fight. A lot like ol' Hornhead here." - Squee, goblin cabin hand, scouting report

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faugh" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While it's true most dragons are cruel, the Shivan dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lightning tethers souls to the world. - Kor saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card at random. Sonic Burst deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't insult a Talruum unless your mount is swift. - Suq'Ata saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most wizards consider a thunderbolt to be a proper retort." - Ertai, wizard adept

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant was felt a few seconds before he was seen.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When traveling the Great Desert avoid wearing the scales of lizards, for the Viashino rule the sands and look poorly on the skinning of their cousins." - Zhalfirin Guide to the Desert

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Love is like a rhino, short-sighted and hasty; if it cannot find a way, it will make a way. - Femeref adage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature they control. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With his newfound sense of self-importance, Squee set his sights on ever-bigger bugs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. - Llanowar penalty for trespassing

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most spiders wait patiently for their prey to arrive. Most spiders aren't forty feet tall.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares - they embodied the worst of the Ice Age." - Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}{G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Freyalise forbid that any stranger should wander into the striders' territory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a spider without an appetite." - Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the gorilla playfully grabbed the wurm's tail, the wurm doubled back and playfully ate the gorilla's head.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen the true path. I will not warm myself by the fire - I will become the flame." - Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Segmented Wurm becomes the target of a spell or ability, put a -1/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only we could so easily leave behind those parts of ourselves that pain us." - Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Clockwork Avian enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian to be greater than four. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Clockwork Beast enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dwarven Ruins enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {T}, Sacrifice Dwarven Ruins: Add {R}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ebon Stronghold enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {T}, Sacrifice Ebon Stronghold: Add {B}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Havenwood Battleground enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}, Sacrifice Havenwood Battleground: Add {G}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Smoldering Crater enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Svyelunite Temple enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {T}, Sacrifice Svyelunite Temple: Add {U}{U}.
